ing: 1 (6 ounce) package cherry flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "Try this easily prepared gelatin salad with poultry dishes. It's red colored and red hot!"
ins: Bring the water to a boil. Dissolve the cinnamon red hot candies in the boiling water. Mix in and dissolve the cherry flavored gelatin. Transfer to a medium bowl.  Mix in the applesauce. Chill in the refrigerator 4 hours, or until firmly gelled.
